#      – Where to put files when calling 'make install'
#      CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE
#      – Type of build (Debug, Release, ...)
#      BUILD_SHARED_LIBS
#      – Switch between shared and static libraries

# Configure gucefVFS

set(HEADER_FILES 
  include/CGUCEFVFSModule.h
  include/CVFS.h
  include/CVFSHandle.h
  include/CVFSURLHandler.h
  include/gucefVFS.h
  include/gucefVFSDLLInit.h

  include/gucefVFS_CIArchive.h
  include/gucefVFS_config.h
  include/gucefVFS_ETypes.h
  include/gucefVFS_macros.h
)

set(SOURCE_FILES 
  src/CGUCEFVFSModule.cpp
  src/CVFS.CPP
  src/CVFSHandle.cpp
  src/CVFSURLHandler.cpp
  src/gucefVFS.cpp
  src/gucefVFS_CFileSystemArchive.cpp
  src/gucefVFS_CIArchive.cpp
)

# Make sure the PLATFORM_HEADER_FILES variable is always defined
 set( PLATFORM_HEADER_FILES "" )

# Make sure the PLATFORM_SOURCE_FILES variable is always defined
 set( PLATFORM_SOURCE_FILES "" )

# For ease of use make a variable that has all files for this module
set( ALL_FILES ${HEADER_FILES} ${SOURCE_FILES} ${PLATFORM_HEADER_FILES} ${PLATFORM_SOURCE_FILES} )




#******** END OF AUTOGENERATED CONTENT ********



add_library( gucefVFS ${ALL_FILES} )
add_dependencies( gucefVFS gucefCORE gucefMT)
target_link_libraries( gucefVFS gucefCORE gucefMT )
set_target_properties( gucefVFS PROPERTIES COMPILE_DEFINITIONS GUCEFVFS_BUILD_MODULE )
GUCEF_config_lib( gucefVFS )


#******** START OF AUTOGENERATED CONTENT ********

endif( WIN32 )

endif( WIN64 )
